bill_title: For the integrity of South Dakota.

bill_versions.bill_text: A RESOLUTION, For the integrity of South Dakota. WHEREAS, the integrity of South Dakota must be safeguarded: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the House of Representatives of the Ninety-Seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that action be taken to protect the integrity of South Dakota.

action_log.status_text: Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
